metrics_conclusion: Cool You Off has higher complexity than the average song  in terms Chord-Melody Tension.
key_conclusion:
Cool You Off is written in the key of E♭ Dorian.  

According to the Theorytab database, it is the 8th most popular key among Dorian keys and     the 43rd most popular  among all keys. The E♭ Dorian scale is similar to the E♭ Minor scale except that its 6th note is a half step higher (C).  Chord progressions in Dorian have a characteristic sound due to the major quality of the chord built on the 4th scale degree. 

See the E♭ Dorian Cheat Sheet for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
